content.webTitle: Picks of the week: Scotland & Ireland: Comedy

fields.headline: Picks of the week: Scotland & Ireland: Comedy
fields.bodyText: The Mighty Boosh Olympia Theatre, Dublin, Saturday Fresh from a third TV series, Julian Barrett and Noel Fielding take their surreal fantasy world out on another national tour. Phil Kay Woodend Barn, Banchory, Saturday A genuinely and wonderfully unpredictable comic, whose performances can literally swing from the sublime to the ridiculous in a matter of minutes. Dylan Moran Greenock Arts Guild Theatre, Greenock, Saturday; Town Hall, Falkirk, Sunday; Findhorn Foundation, Findhorn, Wednesday; One Touch Theatre, Inverness, Thursday More daft tales from the Irishman. Rich Hall Gaiety Theatre, Ayr, Friday Inspirational storyteller and panel-show stalwart Hall returns, with a second-half appearance from his redneck country singer alter-ego Otis Lee Crenshaw. Tom Stade Laughter Lounge, Dublin, Thursday Devilish Canadian Stade hits Dublin with a battery of killer lines and a host of viciously caustic comments on the state of the world.
